entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is running after something.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a close friend of Harry's. He emerges from his cabin to try and stop the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are trying to escape.

entities.name: brother and sister
entities.description: Two people that Harry overtakes using his shortcut. They are closing in behind him.

relationships.description: Harry is chasing the Death Eaters.
Hagrid is trying to stop the Death Eaters from escaping.
The brother and sister are closing in behind Harry.
